price: (93) There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
